Chapter:
Compact Lie Group Package &EquiDeg; allows &GAP; to handle certain types of compact Lie groups in a similar way as finite groups. In the current version, this includes
O(2)\times GO(2)xG (including O(2)) SO(2)\times GSO(2)xG (including SO(2)) where G is a finite group.
